Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler

Interface ClientEnvelope

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientEnvelopeState
    public interface ClientEnvelope
extends ClientEnvelopeState
    Operations available after MAIL FROM is accepted (no recipients yet).

    This interface is provided to the handler in ServerMailFromReplyHandler.handleMailFromOk(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ClientEnvelope) and represents the envelope state before any recipients have been added.

    At this stage, the handler must add at least one recipient with rcptTo() before being able to send message content. The data() method is not available until a recipient is accepted (see ClientEnvelopeReady).

    Author:
    Chris Burdess
    See Also:
    ServerMailFromReplyHandler.handleMailFromOk(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ClientEnvelope), ClientEnvelopeReady

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp.client.handler.ClientEnvelopeState

        hasAcceptedRecipients, quit, rcptTo, rset
